remarks: A constant function is a continuous function on ` CC ` .  (Contributed by Jeff Madsen, 2-Sep-2009.)  (Moved into main set.mm as ~ cncfmptc and may be deleted by mathbox owner, JM. --MC 12-Sep-2015.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 12-Sep-2015.)
statement:
constcncf.1 $e |- F = ( x e. CC |-> A ) $.
constcncf $p |- ( A e. CC -> F e. ( CC -cn-> CC ) ) $.
$d A x $.
